text: [img=kw-Fleeting] - After resolving, this card is removed from the game.
[img=kw-Visible] - Both players can see this card while it is in the story.
[img=kw-Sight X] - The first X cards in the story are visible to you this round.
[img=kw-Inspire X] - Next round you have X extra mana.
Inspired X - This round you have X extra mana.
Nourish X - The next card you resolve is worth +X points.
Starve X - The next card you resolve is worth -X points.
Birth X - If you have a Child in hand, increase its points by X. Otherwise create a 0:X Fleeting Child in hand.
Morning - At the start of each round, if this is the top card of your discard pile, trigger the following effect.
